text: During the first presidential debate, Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump fought about his statements on national religion. We didn't get a response from the Trump campaign the night of the debate. The Trump campaign also failed to respond when we considered his comments on debt in May. Clinton is right that Trump spoke of negotiating debt reduction, but he retracted his views after economists clarified his idea. The Tramp debt statement stems from the comments made by Tramp on national debt in two separate interviews in May.
